p: Essential oil - The EO of C. verum leaves was purchased from Romik Lanka Marketing Services, Moratuwa, Sri Lanka (WCC/3569). The C. verum EO was diluted to 32 mg/mL in Tween 80 (0.05%) solution and Roswell Park Memorial Institute (RPMI) buffered with MOPS [3-(N-morpholino) propane sulfonic acid] followed by sonication, 1 cycle of 20 seconds.
